DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether waveform intracardiac electrograms , acquire ICD , use : - predict malignant ventricular arrhythmia , require appropriate ICD therapy , - predict progression heart failure patient ICD .
DOC.brief_title: Study Implantable Cardioverter Defibrillator ( ICD ) Intracardiac Electrograms
DOC.criteria: history acute MI least 4 week old nonischemic LV dysfunction least 9 month EF < = 35 % resuscitate sudden cardiac arrest ( ventricular tachyarrhythmia ) undergone implantation FDAapproved ICD primary secondary prevention SCD inability unwillingness provide valid inform consent pregnancy condition cardiac disease associate high likelihood death 1 year enrollment
